title: Altair dependency in 1.46 too broad, cannot render documentation example

labels.name: status:needs-triage
labels.description: Has not been triaged by the Streamlit team

body: ### Checklist - [x] I have searched the [existing issues](https://github.com/streamlit/streamlit/issues) for similar issues. - [x] I added a very descriptive title to this issue. - [x] I have provided sufficient information below to help reproduce this issue. ### Summary With a valid set of packages (specifically a low altair version) st.line_chart will fail to chart one of the documentation examples. I believe the altair version should be more restrictive, we had to bump to ^5.0.0 Using the documentation example here: ```python import streamlit as st import pandas as pd import numpy as np chart_data = pd.DataFrame( np.random.randn(20, 3), columns=["col1", "col2", "col3"] ) st.line_chart( chart_data, x="col1", y=["col2", "col3"], color=["#FF0000", "#0000FF"], # Optional) ``` ### Reproducible Code Example ```Python import streamlit as st import pandas as pd import numpy as np chart_data = pd.DataFrame( np.random.randn(20, 3), columns=["col1", "col2", "col3"] ) st.line_chart( chart_data, x="col1", y=["col2", "col3"], color=["#FF0000", "#0000FF"], # Optional) ``` ### Steps To Reproduce 1. Create an environment with the valid versions mentioned above 2. create streamlit_test.py with the example above 3. streamlit run streamlit_test.py Observe: ### Expected Behavior I'd expect this to work, since it's a valid set of packages according to requirements. ### Current Behavior ### Is this a regression? - [ ] Yes, this used to work in a previous version. ### Debug info - Streamlit version: 1.46.1 - Python version: 3.11 - Operating System: Linux - Browser: Chrome Python Packages: This set of packages: ``` streamlit 1.46.1 A faster way to build and share data apps ├── altair >=4.0,<6 │ ├── jinja2 * │ │ └── markupsafe >=2.0 │ ├── jsonschema >=3.0 │ │ ├── attrs >=22.2.0 │ │ ├── jsonschema-specifications >=2023.03.6 │ │ │ └── referencing >=0.31.0 │ │ │ ├── attrs >=22.2.0 (circular dependency aborted here) │ │ │ └── rpds-py >=0.7.0 │ │ ├── referencing >=0.28.4 (circular dependency aborted here) │ │ └── rpds-py >=0.7.1 (circular dependency aborted here) │ ├── narwhals >=1.5.2 │ ├── packaging * │ └── typing-extensions >=4.10.0 ├── blinker >=1.5.0,<2 ├── cachetools >=4.0,<7 ├── click >=7.0,<9 │ └── colorama * ├── gitpython >=3.0.7,<3.1.19 || >3.1.19,<4 │ └── gitdb >=4.0.1,<5 │ └── smmap >=3.0.1,<6 ├── numpy >=1.23,<3 ├── packaging >=20,<26 ├── pandas >=1.4.0,<3 │ ├── numpy >=1.23.2 │ ├── python-dateutil >=2.8.2 │ │ └── six >=1.5 │ ├── pytz >=2020.1 │ └── tzdata >=2022.7 ├── pillow >=7.1.0,<12 ├── protobuf >=3.20,<7 ├── pyarrow >=7.0 │ └── numpy >=1.16.6,<2 ├── pydeck >=0.8.0b4,<1 │ ├── jinja2 >=2.10.1 │ │ └── markupsafe >=2.0 │ └── numpy >=1.16.4 ├── requests >=2.27,<3 │ ├── certifi >=2017.4.17 │ ├── charset-normalizer >=2,<4 │ ├── idna >=2.5,<4 │ └── urllib3 >=1.21.1,<3 ├── tenacity >=8.1.0,<10 ├── toml >=0.10.1,<2 ├── tornado >=6.0.3,<6.5.0 || >6.5.0,<7 ├── typing-extensions >=4.4.0,<5 └── watchdog >=2.1.5,<7 ``` ### Additional Information _No response_
